Posts.Content: Sep 15, 2008 12:47PM Sprtwareor wrote: My BS said 3 nights, but then he released me after 2 nights, when I was up and walking around greater and greater distances, and sitting up in a chair when he came in to check on me. I had stopped the morphine on demand by early evening of the 2nd day, so he said, might as well send you home. I did fine with Advil and ibuprofen.
Posts.Title: How Long in Hospital after Bi-Later with Reconstruction? Mocity mom_of_2
